Deleting your cache directory will cause: Deleting your cache directory will cause you to lose some settings. Do not delete your cache directory unless instructed to do so by a Streamlabs staff member
Delete Cache and Restart: 刪除所有快取並重新啟動
Upload Cache to Developers: 上傳快取資料給開發人員
Confirm stream title and game before goi: 請在直播前，確認實況標題及遊戲項目
WARNING! You will lose all scenes, sourc: 警告！你將「永久」失去所有場景、來源以及設定！
Your cache directory has been successful: 您的快取資料夾上傳成功，檔案 %{file} 以複製到剪貼簿。
This action will restart the application: 這個動作將會重啟整個程式，是否繼續？
Show confirmation dialog when starting s: 開始直播時顯示確認對話框
Show confirmation dialog when stopping s: 停止串流時顯示確認對話框
Keep recording when stream stops: 持續錄影直到直播結束
Snap Sources to edge of screen: 將來源與螢幕邊框對齊
Snap Sources to other sources: 將來源與其他來源對齊
Enforce streaming service bitrate limits: 強制設定串流位元率上限
Encoder Preset (Higher = Less CPU): 編碼器配置 （越高 = 越少CPU使用率）
Generate File Name without Space: 產生沒有空格的檔案名稱
Bicubic (Sharpened scaling, 16 samples): Bicubic（縮放後較銳利，取 16 個樣本數）
Lanczos (Sharpened scaling, 32 samples): Lanczos（縮放後最為銳利，取 32 個樣本數）
No elements found. Consider changing the: 未發現任何元素。請嘗試修改搜尋項目。
Do not back up my media files in the clo: 請不要將我的影音檔案備份在雲端中 （需要重啟應用程式）
Disable Windows audio ducking: 停用 Windows 雙層次音量自動調整
Preserved cutoff point (increase delay): 重新連線時維持截止點 （增加延遲）
Single click selects group. Double click: 單擊選擇群組，雙擊選擇個別單位
Double click selects group. Single click: 單擊選擇個別單位，雙擊選擇群組
Navigate to Live tab when going live: 自動在直播時切換到實況中分頁
Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced: Streaming to a custom ingest is advanced functionality. Some features of Streamlabs OBS may stop working as expected
Deleting your cache directory will cause: Deleting your cache directory will cause you to lose some settings. Do not delete your cache directory unless instructed to do so by a Streamlabs staff member.
You can not change these settings when y: You can not change these settings when you're live
